title: Amazon Alexa Locks "Racist" Owner Out of Smart Home
description:
In this video I discuss how Amazon locked a customer out of their Alexa and connected smart devices for 1 week because a delivery driver through their Eufy doorbell said something racist.

Read the customers blog post
https://medium.com/@bjax_/a-tale-of-unwanted-disruption-my-week-without-amazon-df1074e3818b

https://based.win/
